Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.corpus
    Various extensions for corpus manipulation and analysis, including classes for autoamtically modifying or projectifying a corpus, and classes for calculating corpus statistics.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon
    Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser) and output artefacts ( ParseConfiguration, ParseTree, and DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.evaluate
    Evaluation of transition-based parsing.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in ParserFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output
    Package for outputting parser results.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.evaluate
    Evaluation of pos-tagger performance.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in PosTaggerFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.output
    For outputting pos-tagger results.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    PosTagSet
    A tag set to be used for pos tagging.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.corpus 
    Class and Description
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff 
    Class and Description
    PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized and tagged sentences from a corpus.
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon 
    Class and Description
    PosTag
    A part of speech tag, representing a certain morpho-syntaxic category for a word.
    PosTagSet
    A tag set to be used for pos tagging.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser 
    Class and Description
    PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized and tagged sentences from a corpus.
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.
    Note: this class naturally implements PosTaggerContext since if a token has already been pos-tagged, the once before it have been pos-tagged as well.
    PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one pos-tagged token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction, via a CorpusLineReader.
    The following placeholders are required:
    CorpusLine.CorpusElement.TOKEN, CorpusLine.CorpusElement.POSTAG.
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser.evaluate 
    Class and Description
    PosTagger
    The PosTagger's task is to add part-of-speech tags to words within a sentence.
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features 
    Class and Description
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.
    Note: this class naturally implements PosTaggerContext since if a token has already been pos-tagged, the once before it have been pos-tagged as well.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output 
    Class and Description
    PosTag
    A part of speech tag, representing a certain morpho-syntaxic category for a word.
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.

  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger 
    Class and Description
    NonDeterministicPosTagger
    A non-deterministic pos tagger, which analyses multiple tokenising possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple postagging possibilities.
    PosTag
    A part of speech tag, representing a certain morpho-syntaxic category for a word.
    PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized and tagged sentences from a corpus.
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.
    Note: this class naturally implements PosTaggerContext since if a token has already been pos-tagged, the once before it have been pos-tagged as well.
    PosTagger
    The PosTagger's task is to add part-of-speech tags to words within a sentence.
    PosTaggerContext
    The PosTagger's current context, including the history of decisions taken by the POS tagger so far.
    PosTagOpenClassIndicator
    An enum to indicate whether a PosTag is an open class, a closed class, or an open class which only accepts entries outside of the lexicon.
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
    UnknownPosTagException
    Thrown when the posTag requested does not exist in this pos tag set.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.evaluate
